title: Veteran with a Big Knife
desc:
Post 887
*A traumatised soldier with an extremely large and Unstoppable knife.*

- Choose to {go on alert at night. You will gain Basic defense for the night and} attack anyone {who visits you} with {a Powerful attack that's not as strong as} an extremely large and Unstoppable knife. {This uses up an alert, which you only have three of}.
- **Cleave** during the day.
